dc_title_s: Chart of the Canton River with the entrances & islands
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:304,128. (E 112°55ʹ--E 114°47ʹ/N 23°10ʹ--N 21°50ʹ). Shows depths and hazards to navigation. Also shows "Actions fought [in 1841] by the British and Chinese." Covers Macao, Hong Kong, and Canton. Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Inset map: Plan of the City of Canton. Scale [approximately 1:25,334]. Ancillary map shows the coast of Asia from the Bay of Bengal to the Sea of Japan. 1 map : hand colored ; 43 x 56 cm
